description: Light Antique Gold Haram with intricate temple detailing and matching earrings.
Temple Gold Necklace featuring traditional craftsmanship and ornate pendant work.
Kundan Choker Necklace with layered pearls and gemstone accents.
Teardrop Diamond Set with matching earrings and a statement centerpiece.
Antique Ruby Gold Set crafted with detailed gold filigree and ruby embellishments.

Kundan Pearl Jhumkas featuring intricate gold work and pearl hangings.
Diamond Drop Earrings with a timeless teardrop silhouette and brilliant stones.
